budget.description: Partial Budget entity of a campaign. For full details use Budget

amount.description: The monetary amount of this Budget, i.e. 2000.00

amountRemaining.description: The unspent monetary amount remaining on this Budget, i.e. 150.00

amountSpent.description: The spent monetary amount of this Budget, i.e. 1850.00

creationTime.description: The time when this Budget was created, i.e. "2013-01-14 07:19:16"

currency.description: The currency denomination applied to the budget amount, i.e. "USD"

dailyTarget.description: The maximum amount of spend that is allowed per day. Relevant for DAILY_TARGET pacing. i.e. 100.00

endDate.description: The date this Budget is scheduled to stop spending. If runForever is true this will not be used. i.e. "2014-01-17"

id.description: The id of this Budget, i.e. "00f4b02153ee75f3c9dc4fc128ab041962"

lastModified.description: The last modification date of this Budget, i.e. "2014-01-15 12:24:01"

maximumAmount.description: The maximum amount allowed if defined, i.e. 100.00

name.description: The name of this Budget, i.e. "First quarter budget"

pacing.description: Controls how fast the Budget will be spent, i.e. "AUTOMATIC"

runForever.description: Designates whether the budged has an end date In case of true, "endDate" attribute will not be part of the Budgets attributes. i.e. true

shared.description: Whether the Budget is shared between Campaigns, provided for convenience based on the number of Campaigns associated to this Budget, i.e. true

startDate.description: The date this Budget is scheduled to begin spending, i.e. "2014-01-15"

type.description: Controls on which period the Budget refreshes, i.e. "MONTHLY"

campaignOnAir.description: Is the campaign on air, same as campaignOnAir in Live Status

cpc.description: Cost per monetized user action (for example cost per click). See Currencies for valid cost values

onAirReason.description: The reason for the campaign on air status, same as onAirReason in Live Status
